org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.recovery
Class AeRecoveryEngine

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.AeBusinessProcessEngine
      org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.AeAbstractServerEngine
          org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.recovery.AeRecoveryEngine
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAeBusinessProcessEngine, IAeBusinessProcessEngineCallback, IAeBusinessProcessEngineInternal, IAeBusinessProcessFactory, IAeRecoveryEngine
public class AeRecoveryEngine
extends AeAbstractServerEngine
implements IAeRecoveryEngine

Implements a business process engine that recovers the state of a process from a list of IAeJournalEntry instances.

          Restores the executing items that are flagged as queued in the recovery queue manager so we can match correlated requests

recover

public java.util.List recover(IAeBusinessProcess aProcess,
                              java.util.List aJournalEntries,
                              boolean aQueueRecoveredItems)
                       throws AeBusinessProcessException
Description copied from interface: IAeRecoveryEngine
Recovers the state of the specified process from the given list of IAeJournalEntry instances and returns a list of IAeRecoveredItem instances representing recovered requests. Queues the recovered items if aQueueRecoveredItems is true.

Specified by:
recover in interface IAeRecoveryEngine
Parameters:

aJournalEntries -
aQueueRecoveredItems -
